Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I have a Space Shuttle done from Stock Parts which I'd really like to use. Yes, I know there's the Component Space Shuttle that looks awesome, but it kinda looks TOO real life for me.

The Stock Parts Shuttle has 180 Parts after the Booster and Tank is gone. A lot of that is in the wings.

From what I understand there's UbioWelding continued Plugin supposed to work for 1.04, but it won't work for the wings?
